//Charades Strings Charades MimicGameplay You have to "act out" a movie title without speaking, while the other members of your team try to guess which movie it is Charades Drinking Wheel Show me the Girls Give me boys I Don't Care You will have to decide which one You Kill, You Marry or you F**K TIME-OUT!!!

2 min 1 min 3 min Select time limit Start Skip You need the Facebook App installed on your device. activity_spinwheel_gameplay Spin the Wheel Good Luck !! Spin and Drink Pick someone to tell the truth!! (or next time he/she drinks x2) You Drink one shot Vendetta: the last one that make you drink, drinks (even yourself) Players with Chaos Rules must drink to cleanse them. If there are no played rules, you drink. For every drink you take, pick one victim to drink with you (you can drink all the times you want) Everybody Drinks! Pick someone to drink" OK Play History No items to show Play! Please rate this application. Help us get better and better! Rate!! Not now After spinning the wheel, and doing what the game tells you to do, hand the device to the player to your right. Chaos rules last forever or until a "Healing Glass" is played.
